snippet: The home now says that a resident who died after an evacuation prompted by heavy snowfall last month had not had a seizure; a different woman had.
abstract: Garden Gate Health Care Facility outside Buffalo changes its account about death of resident Ruth Snyder following an evacuation prompted by heavy snow; Snyder's family was told she died after a seizure during evacuation, but administrators say staff had confused two patients, perhaps in effort to protect privacy during move; death is under investigation by New York State Health Department.
lead_paragraph: The home now says that a resident who died after an evacuation prompted by heavy snowfall last month had not had a seizure; a different woman had.

headline.main: Buffalo-Area Nursing Home Changes Account of Woman’s Death After Evacuation
headline.print_headline: Nursing Home Alters Account of Death After Evacuation

keywords.value: Garden Gate Health Care Facility (Cheektowaga, NY)
keywords.name: organizations
